alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:21PM CDT until May 08 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River at Oswego affecting Cherokee and Labette Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River near Parsons affecting Neosho and Labette Counties. For the Neosho River...including Iola, Chanute, Erie, Parsons, Oswego...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Parsons. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:01 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 25.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 9.3 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Neosho River Parsons 21.0 25.5 Sat 8 pm CDT 15.5 11.0 10.1 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Flooding is occurring. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
